name: AddSiteContentTypesCopyFromHub
description: Invoke action addCopyFromContentTypeHub. Add or sync a copy of a published content type from the content type hub to a target site or a list. This method is part of the content type publishing changes to optimize the syncing of published content types to sites and lists, effectively switching from a 'push everywhere' to 'pull as needed' approach. The method allows users to pull content types directly from the content type hub to a site or list.
